Package services

Class LocationService

java.lang.Object
services.Service
services.LocationService
public class LocationService extends Service
LocationService is a class to communicate with the DB for Divisions and Countries. Rather than creating a separate class for each entity, the location class unifies them since both divisions and countries will typically be used together and not separately.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCountries

      public List<Country> getAllCountries()
      Gets all countries in the DB
      Returns:
      a list of all countries. If an error occurred, an empty list is returned.

    • getDivisionsForCountry

      public List<Division> getDivisionsForCountry(int countryId)
      Gets a list of first level divisions for a specific country
      Parameters:
      countryId - the ID of the country to filter for
      Returns:
      a list of Division objects. If there was an error, the list will be empty

      Returns:
